properties.name: socket.port
properties.description: The port number that the server needs to listen to or connect to the server.

properties.name: socket.application-type
properties.description: Is the application type that needs to be started client or server.

properties.name: socket.client.host
properties.description: Address IP, domain name, etc. connected to the server.

properties.name: socket.client.retry-count
properties.description: Maximum number of automatic reconnection, -1 represents infinite reconnection.

properties.name: socket.client.auto-retry
properties.description: Automatically reconnect or not.

properties.name: socket.client.thread-count
properties.description: Number of working threads on the client.

properties.name: socket.client.timeOut
properties.description: The timeout time of the connected server, in milliseconds.

properties.name: socket.server.socket-type
properties.description: Select the enabled socket type.

properties.name: socket.server.boss-threads
properties.description: Configuring the number of boss threads for netty.

properties.name: socket.server.work-threads
properties.description: Configuring the number of work threads for netty.

properties.name: socket.server.enable-idle
properties.description: Enable heartbeat.

properties.name: socket.server.idle-time
properties.description: all idle heartbeat.

properties.name: socket.server.reader-idle-time
properties.description: read idle heartbeat.

properties.name: socket.server.writer-idle-time
properties.description: write idle heartbeat.

properties.name: socket.server.idle-unit
properties.description: heartbeat idle time unit.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.web-socket-path
properties.description: This attribute is valid if the enabled socket type is websocket.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.max-content-length
properties.description: set the maximum packet length for websocket.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.sub-protocols
properties.description: set the sub protocol of websocket.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.allow-extensions
properties.description: set whether websocket ignores extensions.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.max-frame-size
properties.description: Set the maximum number of frames for websocket.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.enable-compress
properties.description: whether to enable data compression.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.enable-ssl
properties.description: Enable SSL connection.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.socket-ssl.cert-path
properties.description: The path address of the ssl certificate.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.socket-ssl.password
properties.description: The password for the ssl certificate.

properties.name: socket.server.websocket.socket-ssl.ssl-type
properties.description: type of ssl certificate.

properties.name: socket.server.socket-backlog
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: SO_BACKLOG.

properties.name: socket.server.socket-reuseaddr
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: SO_REUSEADDR.

properties.name: socket.server.socket-keepalive
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: SO_KEEPALIVE.

properties.name: socket.server.tcp-node-lay
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: TCP_NODELAY.

properties.name: socket.server.allow-half-closure
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: ALLOW_HALF_CLOSURE.

properties.name: socket.server.socket-linger
properties.description: configuration parameters for netty: SO_LINGER.

properties.name: socket.server.auto-register-session
properties.description: Automatically register session to session manager.

properties.name: socket.support-protobuf
properties.description: Protocol type for socket data parsing.

properties.name: socket.enable-log
properties.description: whether to enable netty s processing log.

properties.name: socket.log-level
properties.description: enable the level of netty logging.
